What can I leave on my desk?
responses: Desks should be clean and cleared at all times, not just when you leave the office. Post it notes and confidential information on all levels should not be left on the desk. Make sure your desktop pc is locked every time you leave your desk.

patterns: How do I know I have a phishing email
What does a phishing email look like
What do I look for to check if an email is spam
responses: Look at the email address not just the sender. No legitimate company, for example, will send their emails from an @gmail account. Look for misspelt domain names, or typos in the body of the email. Is it poorly written? does it include suspicious attachments or links? Attachments can have malicious links also. does the message create a sense of urgency? If not sure, always ask our Cyber Team!

patterns: How can I make my password strong
What are the requirements for a strong password
responses: The recipe for a strong password that you can remember will be made up of 3 random words. Capital letters as will as Characters and Numbers should be placed within these words. Make sure its not predictable and it is at least more than 11 characters long. Do not reuse that password anywhere else
